name: Hell Dealer
description:
HELL DEALER

A card-throwing action FPS game made in 3 days for the 69th Minijam, limited by having to include cards as a mechanic.

NOTE: This game is very rushed and unfinished and therefore not very balanced, optimized or well thought out. It will be buggy. We simply published to have gotten something out of the jam.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse-button - (hold) Throw cards

Mouse Scrollwheel - Switch between deck cards

CREDITS

Caphos1 - Game idea/Programming/Art

OrangeScientist1 - Art/Game idea
